_Intro_

Lab5Shiny is a project lab. shiny-app in the course adv.R-programming. It has a simple function of plotting the percentage of each city in a chosen swedish district ("län") for each political party at the the election in 2014.

_Function_

The user can choose what district and what party she wants to see a plot of, from a scroll-down-list.
